parameters.name: host
parameters.description: The host name of the server where the database file is located

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: The port number for connecting to the host

parameters.name: catalog
parameters.description: The catalog name to connect to

parameters.name: schema
parameters.description: The schema name in the catalog to connect to

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The user name to connect to the database

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The encrypted password to connect to the database
